ygData.subject: RE: Lambent armor - what I did last night (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: i also completed the breastplate quest and got nothing.  i spoke to 3 guides but they all said i need to speak to the server GM today after 2pm.  i
ygData.messageBody:
i also completed the breastplate quest and got nothing. i spoke to 3 guides
but they all said i need to speak to the server GM today after 2pm. i
successfully made a ruby lambent from Valissia giving her 2 rubies and a
lambent stone. i gave Cryssia the ruby lambent, basalt carapace, and lute
of the gypsy princess and got nothing. now Cryssia asks for a gypsy lute
from the castle of mistmoore. how could there be another lute from
mistmoore??? i asked one of the guides if they would change that item after
patch and he thinks it is unlikely. that can be the only possiblity or the
quest is broken. i will find out. gonna head to perma tonight for icy
greaves, i have the shin greaves from guk. grats on the arms Elwyn.

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 15 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server



> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> As a
> side note, a bard on our server tried to make the breastplate, but got
> nothing. He says the breastplate quest is bugged, but it
> could just be that
> his faction was too low because I *know* he hailed that
> efreeti who lowers
> your faction when you try and talk to him.
> All the components you need to collect are LORE and NO DROP,
> except for the
> lambent stones which are just LORE.
> If people are interested, I'll post more info as I find it.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartsting
> Level 47 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
